name: Slime King TD
description:
Simple Mazing Tower Defence, Gameboy Restrictions (4 colors, 160x144)

Arrows to move cursor
Z to place towers
X to remove

(Turn based mode)
P to pause
O to next turn

This is a #ludumdare #ludumdare34 submission you can vote for it at at http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=12004
